image_generation_prompt: Vector art: A focused student at a desk, using a magnifying glass to read a complex English academic paper. Lightbulbs glow above, symbolizing understanding. Text "Paper Reading Tips" in a clean, bold sans-serif font, positioned at the top right corner. Bright, encouraging, and educational style. Minimalist background.

Vector art: A respectful student formally handing a neatly organized folder of documents to a smiling, approachable teacher or professor in a bright, academic setting. The folder could subtly imply 'Recommendation Request'. The background can include a bookshelf or a university building silhouette. Focus on a supportive and professional atmosphere. Clean lines, optimistic colors, and a modern flat design style. Text 'Get Your Recommendation!' in a clear, friendly sans-serif font at the top right corner.

Vector art: Two diverse individuals engaged in a dynamic, respectful debate across a table. Speech bubbles above their heads show English phrases like "I understand, but..." and "However, consider this...". The background features subtle elements symbolizing logic and persuasion, like gears or a balanced scale. The overall tone is intelligent, engaging, and empowering. Include the text "Win Debates!" in a bold, modern sans-serif font, positioned at the top center, in a contrasting color like bright yellow.
